CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Object_Type__c, "InvoiceItem"), "Credits Billed", IF( ISPICKVAL(Object_Type__c, "PaymentPart"), "Customer Collections", CASE(Reason_Code__c, "Production","Credits Billed", "Refund","Customer Collections", Reason_Code__c) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: New Charges, Customer Payment or Adjustment Type
CustomField.label: Segment
